title: team creation
body:
good morning trend setters

I'm going to create a team for next season and need interest for all positions. Team will be a semi serious focusing on the fun of the game because everyone like to win :). Also identifying and owning your mistakes for you and the team to aid improvement for all.  
 Pre season will be the time to establish roles and practice together. An open mind is a must and no toxicity at all. I'm open to all players.   
looking forward to some interest. 

Hit me up IGN. 

I'm a shift worker with a family so most of my game time will be during the day from 9am-probs a bout 4pm evening gaming not really going to happen. 

Goofstah

replies.body: dude I am a stay at home dad im pretty chill and interested I play mid mainly and I think i play a fairly decent annie veigar malz i can work on others but they my go to and I have been broadening my horizon with support as my secondary slot im ok with lbitz nami taric and illaoi as supp so if your keen to try things out hit me a line Fonetix.
